channel.title: CVE Feed for Real Time Automation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Real Time Automation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-25159|2024-09-16T18:09:26.549Z -- real%20time%20automation -- 499es%20ethernet%2Fip%20%28enip%29%20adaptor%20source%20code
item.description: 499ES EtherNet/IP (ENIP) Adaptor Source Code is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to send a specially crafted packet that may result in a denial-of-service condition or code execution.
